Preparing ID Verification Turn ID Get your ID card and be ready to use your camera to complete the verification. Place your ID card in the back of your phone and correct the focus until you get a well positioned and neat image. The app will show when you must turn the ID card to process the back side. Please turn your ID card to process the back side. Loading…
Preparing Face Verification Prepare to take a picture of your face. Put your face correctly inside the mask on the screen. Take a neat and focused image. Loading…
Preparing Signature Verification Get ready to sign the Account Contract. You need to make 3 signatures to complete the verification correctly. Loading…
Preparing Voice Verification Prepare to record your voice on with the phone and make the voice verification. You need to read at loud the phrase showed on the screen and there will be only 5 seconds to complete the recording. Loading…
ID Processing Place the ID card in landscape position and centered on the screen. Searching ID… Classify ID… Verifying ID… Turn the ID card !!!
Face Verification Place your face on the watermark to get a correct verification. Searching face… Processing face features… Verifying identity…
Voice Verification Press RECORD button and read at loud the following phrase: Status 00:00:00 The key is the sound of my voice Sending voice features … Verifying voice … Processing voice …
Signature Verification Draw your signature on the white zone and then press SEND button. You will need three attempts to complete the verification. Sending signature features … Verifying signature … Processing signature … Verification failed Verification completed Attempts
Verification Steps Verification Completed ID Processing Facial Verification Voice Verification Signature Verification Press CONTINUE to proceed with the next biometric recognition. You have completed the Verification Process! Press the FINISH button to exit and you will receive the Signed Contract.
